dcterms:description: The KITTI odometry dataset contains 11 sequences with ground truth, used for training, validation, and testing of point cloud prediction models.
dcterms:title: KITTI odometry dataset

dcterms:description: The Argoverse dataset is used for 3D tracking and forecasting, providing rich maps and sequences for training and testing point cloud prediction models.
dcterms:title: Argoverse dataset
